unnormalised: Arre yaar, tumi aatanche census report pollounkulo? Te mhunntat Bharatchi loksankhya 1.4286 billion zali mhunn! Tem mhunttlear, ekdom pagel number, nhoi mhunn? Mhaka aikunk ailem UP-ant soglleant chodd loksankhya asa kiteak tor 24 crores-ancho asat, zalear Lakshadweep mhunttlear, ekdom shant asa fattim 64k lok asa. Ani loksankhya vadhichem pomann 1.1% zalam fattim ekache porthun. Mhaka chintna asa hem soglleamchea bhavishyaka kiteak arth korta. ü§î
text: Arre yaar, tumi aatanche census report pollounkulo? Te mhunntat Bharatchi loksankhya 1.4286 billion zali mhunn! Tem mhunttlear, ekdom pagel number, nhoi mhunn? Mhaka aikunk ailem UP-ant soglleant chodd loksankhya asa kiteak tor 24 crores-ancho asat, zalear Lakshadweep mhunttlear, ekdom shant asa fattim 64k lok asa. Ani loksankhya vadhichem pomann 1.1% zalam fattim ekache porthun. Mhaka chintna asa hem soglleamchea bhavishyaka kiteak arth korta. ü§î
